Description:
NPE when click report from predefined template after cancel creating data source.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report from predefined template simple listing.
2. Click create data source button, then click cancell in data source dialog.
3. Click Layout.

Expected result:
No errors

Actual result:

i can't reproduce this issue.
Looks the exception thrown by ecliplse platform's code.
Could you please try with newst build to confirm this?

Looks the stack trace is same as 127964.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 127964 ***
